name: IpStdInterfaceTNLP
brief:
TNLP implementation wrapping C function pointer interface

StdInterfaceTNLP implements TNLP by delegating to C function pointers
provided through IpStdCInterface.h. This enables C programs to use
Ipopt without C++ inheritance.

The C interface passes:
- Problem dimensions (n_var, n_con, nele_jac, nele_hess)
- Bounds arrays (x_L, x_U, g_L, g_U)
- Starting points (start_x, start_lam, start_z_L, start_z_U)
- Function pointers for eval_f, eval_g, eval_grad_f, eval_jac_g, eval_h

StdInterfaceTNLP converts C callbacks to TNLP virtual method calls.
